channel.title: Help adding ess mine
channel.description: i wanna add essence mining to my server its pi hybrid v3 anyideas

item.title: Help adding ess mine
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“lover854, post:3, topic:396921”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=494079.msg3612083#msg3612083 date=1306677012]
Get the cords of the essence mining area and make the global objects there have the function to mine essence? Narrow it down for us more.

[/quote]
Then you add a void to handle following up to the essence mine for up too 3 squares away. Simple.

Thats possible but if im not wrong then the ess mines only work on mining south east of the object[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding ess mine
